1.label: Better World
coachTips: Choose one issue you care about and take a small, concrete step for it this week.
Ask yourself what kind of world you want to help create, and do one thing today that moves toward it.
Find one way to contribute to a cause you believe in, no matter how small the action.

2.label: Moral
2.coachTip: Think of a moment when you stayed true to someone or something and let it remind you what loyalty means to you.

3.label: Together
coachTips: Contact someone you would like to feel closer to and send a simple, genuine message.
Think of one person you have not spoken to in a while and reach out with a short, heartfelt note.
Share something meaningful with someone today, even if it is just a thought or memory.

4.label: Caring
coachTips: Offer a small act of kindness today, such as a check-in, a compliment or practical help.
Notice someone who might need support and offer a small gesture of care.
Do one thing today that makes someone else's day a little easier or brighter.

5.label: Structure
5.coachTip: Spend ten minutes bringing order to one small area, like your desk or inbox.

6.label: Secure
6.coachTip: Notice one thing that makes you feel safe and make a conscious effort to protect or strengthen it.

7.label: Carefree
coachTips: Plan a short pause today where you intentionally set tasks aside and let your body unwind.
Give yourself permission to do nothing useful for ten minutes and see how it feels.
Find a moment today to breathe slowly and release the tension you are carrying.

8.label: Fun
coachTips: Do something light and playful today, even if it is only for a few minutes.
Rediscover something you enjoyed as a child and allow yourself to play with it again.
Let yourself be silly or spontaneous today, without worrying about the outcome.

9.label: Independent
coachTips: Make one decision today that reflects your own preference, even in a small matter.
Say no to one thing that does not serve you, and notice how it feels to protect your freedom.
Choose something today purely because you want to, not because you should.

10.label: Fantasy
coachTips: Give yourself twenty minutes to make or shape something, without judging the result.
Start a small creative project today and focus on the process rather than the outcome.
Express an idea in a new way—through writing, drawing, building or any form that calls to you.

11.label: Unique
11.coachTip: Name one way in which you differ from others and allow yourself to appreciate it.

12.label: Curious
coachTips: Learn one new fact, idea or perspective today through a conversation, article or video.
Follow your curiosity somewhere unexpected today and see where it leads.
Ask a question you have been wondering about and spend a few minutes exploring the answer.

13.label: Talent
13.coachTip: Practice a skill you value for fifteen minutes and notice what feels a little easier than before.

14.label: Innovation
14.coachTip: Set one clear, realistic task for today and take it to completion.

15.label: Winning
15.coachTip: Choose a manageable challenge you have been postponing and take a first step toward it.

16.label: Self-Assured
16.coachTip: Recall one recent achievement and allow yourself a moment to feel quietly proud of it.

17.label: Recognition
17.coachTip: Express appreciation to someone today in a way that feels natural to you.

18.label: Prestige
18.coachTip: Take a moment to reflect on how you would like to be seen and check whether your actions match that picture.

19.label: Possess
19.coachTip: Look at something you own that matters to you and consider why it deserves its place in your life.

20.label: Leadership
20.coachTip: Use your influence today to support someone or to move a shared goal a small step forward.

21.label: Sporty
coachTips: Include at least one short moment of movement in your day, such as a walk or a stretch.
Move your body in a way that feels good today, even if only for five minutes.
Step outside for a brief walk and notice how your energy shifts.

22.label: Nutrition
coachTips: Make one choice that supports your health today, for example water, fresh food or going to bed on time.
Notice how one healthy choice today makes you feel, and let that guide tomorrow.
Pick one small health ritual—hydration, rest, or movement—and honour it today.

23.label: Esthetics
23.coachTip: Pause to notice one visual detail that you find beautiful, however small.

24.label: Aroused
24.coachTip: Take time to experience a simple sensory moment fully, such as a taste, scent or touch.

explorer.name: The Explorer
explorer.insight: Your curiosity and imagination work hand in hand. You tend to feel most alive when you can explore, learn and try out new possibilities.
explorer.coachTip: Feed your explorer spirit: venture somewhere new this week, physically or mentally.

nurturer.name: The Nurturer
nurturer.insight: Connection and care are at your core. You often feel most at ease when you can support others in a warm, reliable way.
nurturer.coachTip: Your gift is making others feel seen. Use it intentionally with someone who needs it.

achiever.name: The Achiever
achiever.insight: You are driven by mastery and visible progress. Clear goals and tangible results tend to give you focus and energy.
achiever.coachTip: Channel your drive toward something meaningful. Achievement feels best when aligned with purpose.

free_spirit.name: The Free Spirit
free_spirit.insight: You value ease, play and room to move. You flourish when there is space to choose your own pace and enjoy the moment.
free_spirit.coachTip: Protect your freedom fiercely—schedule time for unstructured joy.

groundedLeader.name: The Grounded Leader
groundedLeader.insight: Stability and responsibility matter to you. Others are likely to see you as someone who offers direction without losing sight of people's needs.
groundedLeader.coachTip: Your calm presence is a gift. Lead by example in moments of chaos.

holisticWellness.name: Holistic Wellness
holisticWellness.insight: You see well-being as more than just fitness or food. You pay attention to how body, mind and environment all influence how you feel.
holisticWellness.coachTip: Integrate your wellness practices: combine movement with beauty and mindful eating.

visionaryIdealist.name: The Visionary Idealist
visionaryIdealist.insight: You are moved by big ideas and meaningful change. You are at your best when you can turn your ideals into concrete projects or actions.
visionaryIdealist.coachTip: Turn one of your visions into a small prototype this week.

authenticExpression.name: Authentic Expression
authenticExpression.insight: For you, creativity and being yourself are closely linked. You feel most real when you can express your own voice rather than follow the crowd.
authenticExpression.coachTip: Share something you have created—your authentic voice deserves to be heard.

statusSeeker.name: The Status Builder
statusSeeker.insight: Recognition and respect are important signals for you. When your efforts are seen, it strengthens your motivation to keep raising the bar.
statusSeeker.coachTip: Remember that true prestige comes from impact, not just visibility.

sensoryConnoisseur.name: The Sensory Connoisseur
sensoryConnoisseur.insight: You experience life strongly through your senses. Carefully chosen details in music, food, touch or aesthetics can turn an ordinary moment into something special for you.
sensoryConnoisseur.coachTip: Create a sensory ritual: morning coffee ceremony, evening aromatherapy, or weekly art appreciation.

balanceSeeker.name: The Balance Seeker
balanceSeeker.insight: You seek harmony between security and relaxation, stability and vitality.
balanceSeeker.coachTip: Your balance is your superpower. Protect it by setting boundaries.

creativeAchiever.name: The Creative Achiever
creativeAchiever.insight: You do not just create—you create with impact. Innovation is your path to achievement.
creativeAchiever.coachTip: Combine your creativity with your drive: what could you build that matters?

connectorAchiever.name: The Connector-Achiever
connectorAchiever.insight: You build success through relationships. Your achievements feel most meaningful when they strengthen the bonds around you.
connectorAchiever.coachTip: Look for ways to achieve something that also deepens a relationship this week.

mindfulPerformer.name: The Mindful Performer
mindfulPerformer.insight: You push hard but take care of yourself. Sustainable performance matters more to you than short-term wins.
mindfulPerformer.coachTip: Before your next challenge, check in with your body and give it what it needs.

creativeNurturer.name: The Creative Nurturer
creativeNurturer.insight: You express care through what you create. Your warmth shows up in the things you make and share.
creativeNurturer.coachTip: Create something small this week with someone you care about in mind.

principledVisionary.name: The Principled Visionary
principledVisionary.insight: Your loyalty is to a cause greater than yourself. Principles and purpose guide your vision for a better world.
principledVisionary.coachTip: Identify one principle you hold dear and find a way to act on it this week.

balancedStriver.name: The Balanced Striver
balancedStriver.insight: You know when to push and when to pause. Relaxation is not laziness for you—it is fuel for your next achievement.
balancedStriver.coachTip: Schedule both a focused work session and a guilt-free rest period today.

high: You naturally help people feel included and safe.
Being connected to others seems to give you energy.
You are often the person others can rely on.
mid: You seem to move comfortably between standing on your own feet and being part of a group.
You already have people and places where you feel at home.
You know how to give and receive support.
low: You are used to managing a lot on your own.
Independence is clearly important to you.
You know how to carry yourself through challenging situations.

high: You approach life with an open and questioning mind.
You tend to see the world as something to discover rather than just to get through.
Learning and experimenting seem to come naturally to you.
mid: You already know how energising it feels to follow your curiosity.
You seem to enjoy learning and trying new things when you can.
Your curiosity is a helpful compass.
low: Daily demands may leave little room for lightness or exploration.
It might feel like there is always something more important than your own interests.
You do not need big changes to restart your sense of growth.

high: You have a strong inner drive to achieve and move things forward.
You seem to set the bar high for yourself.
You are likely to take initiative and seek growth.
mid: You seem to have a healthy level of ambition without losing yourself in it.
You are willing to work for what you care about.
You can push yourself, but you also know when to slow down.
low: Your motivation may come more from meaning, connection or enjoyment than from constant push.
You do not have to chase big goals to live a valuable life.
You may prefer steady contribution over being in the spotlight.

both: Your body knows what it needs
Your physical self is a priority
Taking care from the inside out

high: You clearly treat your health as an important foundation.
You seem to understand your body's signals and act on them.
Energy and physical care appear to be active priorities for you.
mid: You seem to know what helps you feel well.
There is already some attention for your body and health.
You are not starting from zero when it comes to vitality.
low: Caring for your body and energy could use more attention.
It may feel like your body only gets attention when something is wrong.
You do not have to change everything at once to feel better.

high: You experience the world strongly through your senses.
Details in music, food, touch or surroundings clearly matter to you.
You do not just register what is around you; you savour it.
mid: You already notice and appreciate pleasant moments.
Aesthetics and atmosphere have some place in your life.
You seem to value small pleasures when they appear.
low: Life may feel quite practical or task-focused at times.
It is easy to move through the day on autopilot.
You do not need big experiences to feel more alive.

openingPhrases: Here is what stands out about you:
transitionPhrases: It is also worth noting that
closingPhrases: This is your unique happiness fingerprint.
These drives shape how you experience the world.
Understanding these patterns can help you thrive.
Lean into these insights—they are uniquely yours.
This is what makes you, you.
